description: Create a project phase revenue item.
permissions: Authorization is delegated to the related project phase (project_phase).
side_effects: Creates a project phase revenue item.
validation_notes: --project-phase and --project-revenue-item are required. --quantity-strategy must be one of: direct, indirect. quantity_strategy defaults to direct when not provided. project_revenue_item must belong to the same project as the project_phase. project_revenue_item must be unique within a project_phase. project_revenue_classification must be a child of the revenue classification of the revenue item. project_revenue_classification must belong to the same broker as the project.

flags.name: --quantity-strategy
flags.validation: Must be one of: direct, indirect.
